recipesJson.name: Valencia orange & passionfruit (Remix)
recipesJson.author: Tvsty1
recipesJson.description:
This is my remix of ohm boy valencia orange & passionfruit.

Cap sweet tangerine is definitely the main flavour In this juice, so at 5% it stands right at the front. 

Cap juicy orange is there just to push that orange flavour even more (although I do believe they are only using cap sweet tangerine)

I don't really taste too much passionfruit so I put it at 2%, this is enough for it show up in the background.

It's a commercial juice so ofcourse we have cap super sweet. 

It can be snv but I recommend giving it atleast a week for the all the citrus to settle to down a little.

reviews.text: This is good but its a little lite on the flavour!! At least for me.
